name: Sashimi Platter
title: Sashimi Platter
desc: Under the blade of a master chef, the texture of the ingredients remains pristine. Upon consumption, it is as if something living is leaping inside your mouth...\nHold on, could these ingredients still be...

skills.desc: Before this Round ends, the target character's Normal Attacks deal +1 DMG. (A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)
